description: Unique identifier for the mapping between a repair group component and a permitted maintenance action; used to track and reference this rule in work orders and configuration.
Identifier of the specific component within a repair group to which the action applies; links to the component definition used in maintenance planning and parts selection.
Reference to the cataloged maintenance activity (e.g., inspect, adjust, replace) that should be performed on the component; used to standardize work steps and reporting.
Flag indicating this mapping is deprecated and should no longer be used for new jobs; retained only for historical records or legacy configurations.
